Tuberculosis	(TB)
TB is a serious infectious 
disease that can lead to TB 
meningitis (swelling of the 
lining of the brain) in babies.
In young people and adults it 
usually	affects	the	lungs,	but	
it	can	also	affect	the	glands,	
brain or bones. Prevention is by 
the BCG vaccine which helps 
your baby develop protection 
(immunity) against the disease.
